info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 03 at 9:58PM CDT until further notice by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CARSON...HUTCHINSON...NORTHEASTERN POTTER AND SOUTHEASTERN MOORE COUNTIES... At 957 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sanford, or 9 miles west of Borger, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Borger, Fritch, Stinnett, Sanford, Lake Meredith and Pringle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
